# isAnimating

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the activity indicator is currently running its animation.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isAnimating: Bool { get }
```

## Managing an activity indicator

- **startAnimating()**: Starts the animation of the progress indicator.
- **stopAnimating()**: Stops the animation of the progress indicator.
- **hidesWhenStopped**: A Boolean value that controls whether the activity indicator is hidden when the animation is stopped.
